name: AICB
description: AICB is committed to providing a public chain for authenticated entity users, under the condition of fully protecting personal privacy, all information on the chain is open and transparent, and there are social natural persons behind the address on the chain. Many blockchain networks and systems can be connected to it, allowing decentralized centralized systems to merge with it and penetrate each other, and ultimately connect the on-chain and off-chain world efficiently and easily. This will make blockchain an inclusive technology, making it easier to develop applications based on this technology, and ultimately connecting the blockchain world.
